metadata.title: CVE-2023-37201 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have triggered a use-after-free condition when creating aWebRTC connection over HTTPS. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115,Firefox ESR < 102.13, and Thunderbird < 102.13.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
